leadership.name: Robert Mpagazehe
leadership.bio: Robert Mpagazehe is the founder and Managing Director of Maxwell Consultancy Ltd. With over 25 years of experience in structural engineering and project management, Robert has led the company from its inception in 2005 to become one of Rwanda's leading engineering consultancy firms. He holds a Master's degree in Structural Engineering from the University of Cape Town and a Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering from the University of Rwanda.
education: MSc in Structural Engineering, University of Cape Town
BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 25+ years in structural engineering and project management
Led over 100 major infrastructure projects across East Africa
Former Head of Engineering at Rwanda Housing Authority
certifications: Chartered Engineer, Institution of Civil Engineers (UK)

leadership.name: Jane Dusabe
leadership.bio: Jane Dusabe serves as the Technical Director at Maxwell Consultancy Ltd, overseeing all technical operations and quality assurance. With a PhD in Environmental Engineering from the University of Nairobi, Jane brings specialized expertise in water supply systems and environmental impact assessments. She has been with the company since 2010 and has played a crucial role in expanding the firm's service offerings and technical capabilities.
education: PhD in Environmental Engineering, University of Nairobi
MSc in Water Resources Engineering, UNESCO-IHE Institute for Water Education
BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 15+ years in water resources and environmental engineering
Led the design of major water supply projects serving over 500,000 people
Former consultant for the United Nations Development Programme

leadership.name: Jean Ngabonziza
leadership.bio: Jean Ngabonziza is the Operations Director at Maxwell Consultancy Ltd, responsible for project operations, resource allocation, and client relations. With an MBA from the University of Rwanda and 15 years of experience in project management, Jean ensures that all projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. He joined Maxwell Consultancy in 2012 after a successful career in construction management.
education: MBA, University of Rwanda
BSc in Construction Management, Jomo Kenyatta University
experience: 15+ years in project management and construction supervision
Managed projects with a combined value of over $50 million
Former Project Manager at Rwanda Development Board

senior_engineers.name: Alice Mutoni
senior_engineers.bio: Alice Mutoni is a Senior Structural Engineer with 12 years of experience in designing complex structures. She specializes in seismic design and has contributed to several landmark buildings in Kigali.
education: MSc in Structural Engineering, University of Nairobi
BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 12+ years in structural design and analysis
Lead engineer for the RRA Building project
Former lecturer at the University of Rwanda
certifications: Structural Engineering Certificate, American Concrete Institute

senior_engineers.name: Eric Habimana
senior_engineers.bio: Eric Habimana is a Senior Civil Engineer specializing in transportation infrastructure. With 10 years of experience, he has led the design and supervision of major road and airport projects.
education: MSc in Highway Engineering, University of Cape Town
BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 10+ years in transportation infrastructure design
Lead engineer for the Kigali International Airport expansion
Former engineer at the Rwanda Transport Development Agency

senior_engineers.name: Marie Uwase
senior_engineers.bio: Marie Uwase is a Senior Environmental Engineer with expertise in environmental impact assessments and sustainable design. She has led numerous environmental studies for major infrastructure projects.
education: MSc in Environmental Engineering, University of Stellenbosch
BSc in Environmental Science, University of Rwanda
experience: 9+ years in environmental engineering and impact assessment
Led environmental studies for over 20 major projects
Former environmental consultant for the Rwanda Environment Management Authority

project_managers.name: David Mugisha
project_managers.bio: David Mugisha is a Senior Project Manager with extensive experience in managing complex engineering projects. He specializes in government infrastructure projects and has successfully delivered numerous high-profile assignments.
education: MSc in Project Management, University of Nairobi
BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 14+ years in project management
Managed projects with a combined value of over $30 million
Former project coordinator at the Ministry of Infrastructure

project_managers.name: Grace Kamaliza
project_managers.bio: Grace Kamaliza is a Project Manager specializing in water infrastructure projects. She has successfully managed numerous water supply and sanitation projects throughout Rwanda.
education: MSc in Water Resources Management, UNESCO-IHE Institute for Water Education
BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 8+ years in project management for water infrastructure
Led the Gatsibo Water Supply project
Former engineer at Water and Sanitation Corporation (WASAC)

technical_staff.name: James Niyonzima
technical_staff.bio: James Niyonzima is a Structural Engineer with 5 years of experience in building design and analysis. He specializes in reinforced concrete structures and has contributed to several commercial building projects.
education: BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 5+ years in structural engineering
Involved in the design of 10+ commercial buildings
Former junior engineer at a local construction firm

technical_staff.name: Claire Ishimwe
technical_staff.bio: Claire Ishimwe is a Civil Engineer focusing on road design and drainage systems. She has been involved in several urban infrastructure projects in Kigali and other cities.
education: BSc in Civil Engineering, University of Rwanda
experience: 4+ years in civil engineering
Involved in the Kigali Urban Roads Upgrade project
Former intern at the City of Kigali

technical_staff.name: Peter Kwizera
technical_staff.bio: Peter Kwizera is a skilled CAD Technician with expertise in creating detailed engineering drawings and 3D models. He supports the engineering team with technical drafting and visualization.
education: Diploma in Architectural Technology, Integrated Polytechnic Regional College (IPRC)
experience: 7+ years in technical drafting and CAD
Created drawings for over 30 major projects
Former CAD technician at an architectural firm

support_staff.name: Sarah Mukamana
support_staff.bio: Sarah Mukamana is the Finance Manager responsible for financial planning, accounting, and reporting. She ensures the company's financial health and compliance with regulatory requirements.
education: MBA in Finance, University of Rwanda
Bachelor of Commerce, University of Nairobi
experience: 10+ years in financial management
Former accountant at a multinational corporation
Expertise in project financial planning and control
certifications: Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) Member

support_staff.name: Patrick Gasana
support_staff.bio: Patrick Gasana oversees human resources and administrative functions, including recruitment, staff development, office management, and logistics. He plays a key role in maintaining a positive work environment.
education: MSc in Human Resource Management, University of Rwanda
Bachelor of Business Administration, Mount Kenya University
experience: 8+ years in HR and administration
Former HR officer at a regional bank
Expertise in talent acquisition and development

support_staff.name: Diane Umutoni
support_staff.bio: Diane Umutoni manages the company's marketing and communications activities, including branding, digital presence, client communications, and public relations.
education: Bachelor of Arts in Communication, University of Rwanda
experience: 5+ years in marketing and communications
Former communications officer at a development organization
Expertise in digital marketing and content creation
